name: Sea battle ultimate
description:
“Sea battle ultimate” is a reworked old game but with a new  graphics and more smooth gameplay.

The project is under development, and therefore, over time, new mechanics will be added and shortcomings will be corrected.

In the future I plan to add a network game, improve graphics and add post processing.

In short, to improve the game as much as possible, but at the same time not to go far from the original.

Credits:

Programming, Design, 3D Assets, Sounds, Music: YugG0

This game is made in honor of the defenders of Ukraine

Thanks for playing!
